title: Ornate condensed display face used by M/M Paris
content:
I found this font through M/M Paris. is it a custom font or can I buy this? and where can i buy this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/carine_5820.jpg)
author: stianhoeiaas

comments.content: M/M Paris are known for designing their own custom type. That being said, this could be retail of course. I for one don't know what it could be.

Reminds me a bit of [Mata Hari](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201656/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/holland_fonts/mata_hari_hollandaise/) and [Solstice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/solstice/?refby=typographica).

Better late than never: it's Carine by M/M. They created this Typeface for their redesign of the french Vogue:  
 [http://www.frieze.com/issue/article/new\_faces/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201656/http:/www.frieze.com/issue/article/new_faces/)
